mapper.select: select t3.auth from sys_manager_role t1 left join sys_role_menu t2 on t1.role_id = t2.role_id left join sys_menu t3 on t2.menu_id = t3.pk_id where t1.manager_id = #{managerId} and t1.delete_flag = 0 and t2.delete_flag = 0 and t3.delete_flag = 0 and t3.type = 'button' order by t3.sort asc
select auth from sys_menu where delete_flag = 0 and type = 'button'
